text:
Hello !
I made a workflow action and when I use it in a workflow, the request send on my action_url has the workflowId but it's actually the value of the flowId (picture) so I can't use the api route to get a specific workflow informatio. Someone know what is the flowId and why th wf return this and note the real workflowId ? Thanks
(The picture come from the request to get all workflow, that's how I know that th wf return the flowId and not the real workflowId)
